text:
@CNBC In all due respect, Mr. Jim O'Neill, one should thank God there's a nation like India present to guide and take the lead in this fight, also recognised rightfully by the WORLD HEALTH ORGANISATION - 'WHO praises PM Modi's efforts to contain Coronavirus' -
https://t.co/NGbzgBFzxr
